verses.html:
1
For my faith destitute.
More than I can bear!
Think of Christ born so poor.
Why should I despair?

verses.label: 1C
verses.html:
1
Jesus gives me peace,
Jesus gives me peace,
Peace that Jesus gives me
The world has not giv’n.
Man cannot Take away, ’Tis the peace of heav’n.

2
For the Truth sacrifice.
More than I can bear!
Think of Christ’s crown of thorns.
Why should I despair?

verses.html:
2

3
For ’Good News’ hardships more;
More than I can bear!
Think of Christ scorned of men.
Why should I despair?
